title: Dissent on Ukraine Emerges in the Heart of Europe
sub_head: Deep suspicion of hegemonic media narratives has earned Vladimir Putin some sympathy in the Czech Republic, Hungary and Slovakia.
body:
Prague
Russiaâ€™s invasion of Ukraine has hit a deep nerve in ex-communist states, which are already taking in the majority of Ukrainian refugees and which would be affected first by any escalation of the conflict.
